results.title: The porphyrinogenic effect of simvastatin in experimental systems.
results.text_hl: In two experimental models of acute @<m>DISEASE_Porphyrias_Hepatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017094 @@@hepatic porphyria@@@--monolayers of @SPECIES_9031 @@@chick@@@ embryo liver cells induced by @CHEMICAL_Zalcitabine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016047 @@@DDC@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Dicarbethoxydihydrocollidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003997 @@@diethoxycarbonyl dihydrocollidine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Zalcitabine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016047 @@@DDC@@@) injected @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@--@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was shown to increase @CHEMICAL_Porphyrins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011166 @@@porphyrin@@@ formation.

citations.NLM: Schoenfeld N, Mamet R, Lurie Y, Green P, Bomstein Y, Atsmon A. The porphyrinogenic effect of simvastatin in experimental systems. Biomed Pharmacother. 1989;43(2):135-9. PMID: 2736273
